lead_paragraph: Alfred A. Checchi, a multimillionaire businessman who has expressed an interest in running for Governor of California, announced today that he was stepping down as co-chairman of Northwest Airlines. Mr. Checchi, 48, of Beverly Hills, told a Sacramento Press Club luncheon earlier this month that he was considering a run for governor, and the announcement of his resignation today repeated a reference to his political ambitions. He is a Democrat.
abstract: Alfred A Checchi, multimillionaire businessman who has expressed interest in running for Governor of California, is stepping down as co-chairman of Northwest Airlines; announcement of his resignation makes reference to his political ambitions; he is a Democrat (S)
